sentences.en: " That's right! "'sling Chien Pao - sheng out and sling his stooge out with him!
sentences.cn: “ 不错,叫钱葆生滚出去! 钱葆生的走狗也滚出去!

sentences.en: Don't stooge about! Do something useful.
sentences.cn: 别闲转悠! 找点有意义的事干干.

sentences.en: His role was to stooge for the popular comedian.
I'd play stooge to him in the performance.
sentences.cn: 在表演中我来给他当作配角.

sentences.en: The charge that Harding was a political stooge may be a canard.
sentences.cn: 关于哈丁是个政治走狗的指控可能是个谣传。

words.tran_cn: 喜剧里的配角或丑角；助手；傀儡；密探

trans.tran_cn: 喜剧里的配角或丑角，助手，伙伴
trans.tran_en: someone who is used by someone else to do something unpleasant, dishonest, or illegal – used to show disapproval
